import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Routes, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import TodoApp from './Pages/TodoApp'; import StatisticsPage from './Pages/StatisticsPage'; const App = () => { return (
Task Manager
Todo Page Statistics Page
Todo Page Statistics Page
); }; export default App;
